title: Torches
info: Torches are furniture items that produce light when placed, held, or dropped (via the Throw key), and are crucial at all stages of gameplay as primary light sources. Torches provide light permanently, and are never consumed. Regular torches can be found randomly in chests and Pots, as a bonus drop    from slimes, or purchased from the Merchant or Skeleton Merchant for 50 each.

stat.table:
Type
FurnitureLight source
Placeable (1 wide × 1 high)
Use time15 (Very fast)
TooltipProvides light
Max stack999 / 99   
Rarity00*
